name: RESULTS - Forest Cover Inventory - roads
query: STOCKING_STATUS_CODE = 'NP' AND STOCKING_TYPE_CODE IN ('RD','UNN') AND SILV_POLYGON_NUMBER NOT IN ('landing', 'lnd') AND GEOMETRY_EXIST_IND = 'Y'

name: Forest Tenure Road Section Lines - active
fields: FOREST_FILE_ID, ROAD_SECTION_ID, FILE_TYPE_CODE, FILE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, FILE_STATUS_CODE, RETIREMENT_DATE, LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS_CODE, AWARD_DATE, CLIENT_NUMBER, CLIENT_NAME

name: Forest Tenure Road Section Lines - retired
fields: FOREST_FILE_ID, ROAD_SECTION_ID, FILE_TYPE_CODE, FILE_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, FILE_STATUS_CODE, RETIREMENT_DATE, LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS_CODE, AWARD_DATE, CLIENT_NUMBER, CLIENT_NAME

name: Oil and Gas Commission Road Segment Permits
fields: ROAD_NUMBER, SEGMENT_NUMBER, ROAD_TYPE, ROAD_TYPE_DESC, ACTIVITY_APPROVAL_DATE, PROPONENT

name: Oil and Gas Commission Road Right of Way Permits
